name: UIImage.ResizingMode
desc: Constants that specify the possible resizing modes for an image.

items.name: case tile
items.desc: The image is tiled when it is resized. In other words, the interior region of the original image will be repeated to fill in the interior region of the newly resized image.

items.name: case stretch
items.desc: The image is stretched when it is resized. In other words, the interior region of the original image will be scaled to fill in the interior region of the newly resized imaged.
